author: James D. Walsh
title: Is “Viral Load” Why Some People Get a Mild Case of COVID-19?
description: Researchers have a theory as to why the virus knocks some people flat and leaves others unaffected.
content: As researchers try to understand why some people infected with COVID-19 experience mild or nonexistent symptoms, while others require hospitalization, one factor they have considered is the viral load the amount of the virus detected in a patient. The viral l… [+6726 chars]
